item.title: DC510 - July 11, 2022 - LAST MEETING BEFORE DEFCON
item.description: DC510 - July 11, 2022 - LAST MEETING BEFORE DEFCON July 11, 2022 (Monday) It's our last meeting before defcon! Come talk about defcon prep! There's also a movie!

item.title: DC510 - June 4-5, 2022 - BACK AT BSIDES
item.description: DC510 - June 4-5, 2022 - BACK AT BSIDES June 4-5, 2022 (Saturday and Sunday) We're back, finally! No info on when the official meeting is happening, but you can for sure catch us out in the smoking lounge.

item.title: DC510 - May 9, 2022 - Dallos, Texos
item.description: DC510 - May 9, 2022 - Dallos, Texos May 09, 2022 (Monday) We'll be there around 7:30, and we'll probably stay until 9 or 9:30, whenever the movie ends, and head next door to start the meeting. The movie is Dallos, a classic OAV.

item.title: DC510 - April 11, 2022 - Some Real Geniuses Up In This Club
item.description: DC510 - April 11, 2022 - Some Real Geniuses Up In This Club April 11, 2022 (Monday) We'll be there around 7:30, and we'll probably stay until 9 or 9:30, whenever the movie ends, and head next door to start the meeting. The movie is Real Genius, a classic.

item.title: DC510 - March 14, 2022 - we're at the bar
item.description: DC510 - March 14, 2021 - we're at the bar March, 2021 (Monday) Movie or no, we're going to be at the bar on March 14th, yes we'll be sleepy from daylight savings, yes its pi day, we know about it, and we'll be drinking to forget

item.title: DC510 - February 14, 2022 - dc510 for the painfully alone
item.description: DC510 - February 14, 2022 - dc510 for the painfully alone February 14, 2021 (Monday) It's valentimes day y'all. Come watch The Fifth Element with us. It starts at 7:00, we'll probably start the meeting around 9:00 PM.

item.title: DC510 - November 08, 2021 - it is november
item.description: DC510 - November 08, 2021 - november is the month. November 08, 2021 (Monday) The name of the month is November. The movie is Equilibrium, which is a film. It starts at 7:00, we'll probably start the meeting around 9:00 PM. Take your Prozium, kids.

item.title: DC510 - October 11, 2021 - sp00ky dc510
item.description: DC510 - October 11, 2021 - It's spooky month again. October 11, 2021 (Monday) The movie is Cowboy Bebop, the movie. It starts at 7:00, we'll probably start the meeting around 9:00 PM. The trains run to midnight again!

item.title: DC510 - July 12, 2021 - your LAST CHANCE or something
item.description: DC510 - July 12, 2021 - your LAST CHANCE or something July 12, 2021 (Monday) Last official meeting before DEFCON! The movie is Akira, again. It starts at 7:00, we'll probably just be there to chat and drink, the last train out is at 9:00 PM.

item.title: DC510 - July 12, 2021 - your LAST CHANCE or something
item.description: DC510 - July 12, 2021 - your LAST CHANCE or something July 12, 2021 (Monday) Last official meeting before DEFCON! The movie is Akira, again. It starts at 7:00, we'll probably just be there to chat and drink, the last train out is at 9:00 PM.

item.title: DC510 - June 14, 2021 - It's Hackers Again
item.description: DC510 - June 14, 2021 - It's Hackers Again June 14, 2021 (Monday) The movie is Hackers, again. It starts at 7:00, we’ll probably keep hanging around in the bar parklet a while, heads up the BART stops REAL EARLY now.

item.title: DC510 - May, 2021 - WE'RE BACK FOR 510
item.description: DC510 - May, 2021 - WE'RE BACK FOR 510 May 10, 2021 (Monday) Next meeting is Monday, May 10, and the movie is Demolition Man, which runs 115 minutes. Figure on the meeting starting at about 9:00 - 9:15.

item.title: DC510 - February, 2020
item.description:
DC510 - February, 2020 Feb 10, 2020 (Monday) Next meeting is Monday, January 13, and the movie is Electric Dreams, which runs 112 minutes and features Giorgio Moroder on the soundtrack. Figure on the meeting starting at about 9:15 - 9:25. We’ll be talking about the Bsides SF 10th Anniversary, which we’ll be at from Feb 22 - Feb 24.
SPECIAL OTHER INFO: We’ll be showing up to Cyberdelia on Feb 28 over at the DNA Lounge. Probably. How could we miss it?

item.title: DC510 - November, 2019
item.description: DC510 - November, 2019 Nov 11, 2019 (Monday) It's November! The Meeting is on Nov 11, Veterans Day! Will they be showing Blade Runner, as we keep hearing about? An episode of Altered Carbon, about a veteran? No, it's Tetsuo: Iron Man, a November classic if we've ever seen one! That movie only lasts 67 minutes! It'll probably end early! Hit us up and we'll wait for you.

item.title: DC510 - We're Trying To Be Spooky
item.description: DC510: We're Trying To Be Spooky Oct 14, 2019 (Monday) The bar is showing Pulse, but not the Kiyoshi Kurosawa horror movie. We'll be there anyway! Figure on meeting up at like 9:15.

item.title: DC510 - Last Meeting Before DEFCON?
item.description: DC510: Last Meeting Before DEFCON? Jul 08, 2019 (Monday) We don't know if Cyberpunk Cinema is happening, but we're going to be meeting on July 8 for sure, probably at the Knockout SF. Watch this space for more info when we get it.

item.title: DC510 - Kingfish
item.description: DC510: Kingfish Jun 12, 2019 (Wednesday) Cyberpunk Cinema is cancelled, but we're not. Meet up with us at the Kingfish Pub in Oakland, 5227 Telegraph Ave, .8 miles from the MacArthur BART. We'll probably be in there drinking from 8:30 - 9:00, and we'll start the meeting around 9. Hit us up if you're running late.

item.title: DC510 - Upgrade
item.description: DC510: Upgrade May 13, 2019 (Monday) This month's pre-meeting drinking is Upgrade. You'll pay nothing for the whole seat but you'll only need THE EDGE. We'll be at the bar, probably. It runs 100 minutes, figure on meeting up at 9:10 - 9:15

item.title: DC510 - Hackers.
item.description: DC510: Hackers. April 8, 2019 (Monday) This month’s pre-meeting drinking is the Hackers, the movie, a classic we’ve been seeing a lot of lately. It runs 107 minutes, figure on meeting up at 9:15 - 9:20

item.title: DC510 Valentines Day Heart Emoji
item.description: DC510 To Get You In The Mood Feb 11, 2018 This month’s pre-meeting drinking is the original Terminator, starring our former governor and also Michael Biehn. It runs 107 minutes, figure on meeting up at 9:10 - 9:15

item.title: DC510 - Christmas Special
item.description: DC510 - Christmas Special Dec 10, 2018 This month’s pre-meeting drinking is Burst City, a Japanese (cyber?)punk classic. The movie starts around 7:00, runs 115 minutes, basically figure on meeting up at like 9:05-9:15. Email us if you’re running late and want us to stick around to see you.

item.title: DC510 - November Meeting
item.description: DC510 - November Meeting Nov 12, 2018 This month's pre-meeting drinking is Aliens, a film we all know by heart. The movie starts around 7:00, runs maybe 137 minutes depending on which cut they use, basically figure on meeting up at like 9:15-9:20. Email us if you're running late and want us to stick around to see you.

item.title: DC510 - Spooktober Meeting
item.description: DC510 - Spooktober Meeting Oct 8, 2018 This month's pre-meeting drinking will feature a not-spooky movie, Total Recall. Yeah, we're sad that it's not Hardware. The movie starts at 7:00, runs 113 minutes, so figure on meeting up at like 9:10-9:20. Email or dm us if you're running late and want us to stick around to see you.

item.title: DC510 - August Meeting
item.description: DC510 - August Meeting Aug 24, 2018 We're doing a meeting to make up for the one we missed thanks to the con! Location: The Lawn at the Corner of Lake Merritt Drive and Lakeside Drive in Oakland (You can walk from the Lake Merritt BART) We'll be gathering from 8:30 - 9:00 PM, and then walking somewhere else. Do you know where? Tell us!

item.title: DC510 - June Meeting
item.description: DC510 - June Meeting June 11, 2018 Knockout SF (3223 Mission St, walking distance of the 24th Street BART) The Movie (some episodes of Serial Experiments Lain) starts at 6:30, includes some opener, and runs a while. DC510 will be at the bar until 9:00, when we'll start the meeting proper.

item.title: DC510 - April Meeting
item.description: DC510 - April Meeting April 9, 2018 Knockout SF (3223 Mission St, walking distance of the 24th Street BART) The Movie (Sneakers) starts at 6:30, includes some opener, runs 126 minutes, and will probably end around 9:20-9:30.

item.title: DC510 - March Meeting
item.description:
DC510 - March Meeting March 12, 2018 Knockout SF (3223 Mission St, walking distance of the 24th Street BART) The Movie (They Live) starts at 6:30, includes some opener, runs 94 minutes, and will probably end around 9:00-9:10.
Bring your sunglasses.

item.title: DC510 - February Meeting
item.description:
DC510 - February Meeting February 12, 2018 Knockout SF (3223 Mission St, walking distance of the 24th Street BART) The Movie (Zero Theorem) starts at 6:30, includes some opener, runs 111 minutes, and will probably end around 9:00-9:10.
Also, we updated our mailing address!
